VisionEval

A common framework for strategic planning models.

Home Download Information for Users Information for Developers About VisionEval
VisionEval is currently operated by the Collaborative Development of New Strategic Planning Models Pooled Fund.
info@visioneval.org

VisionEval

We are honored to announce that VisionEval has received the Zephyr Foundation Exceptional Technical Achievement Award in 2021!


VisionEval is a collaborative project to build a family of strategic tools for performance-based transportation planning into a single open-source programming framework. Strategic tools are designed to evaluate many alternative futures and policies to help state and metropolitan area governments address pressing issues, despite uncertainty. The common framework enables new model features to be added in a ‘plug-and-play’ fashion so they can be easily shared among models. Use the resources below to learn more about this exciting project and how your agency can get involved.

Resources

  • The collaborative development of VisionEval occurs on GitHub.
  • End User and Developer documentation can be found in the Wiki.
  • For introductions to the key models of VisionEval, including the Regional Strategic Planning Model (VE-RSPM) and the Rapid Policy Analysis Tool (VE-RPAT), see the About and Users pages.
  • The Concept Primer covers the concepts of VisionEval for transportation planners.
